name: @squirrel-labs/peanut-sdk
description: The Peanut Protocol SDK! See examples/ folder

scripts.build:prod: npm run clean && webpack --config webpack.config.cjs --mode production --env minimize
scripts.git: git add . && git commit -m 'Release' && git push
scripts.release: npm run check-git-status && npm run build:prod && npm test && npm version patch --allow-dirty && npm run git && npm run npm-publish
scripts.check-git-status: git diff-index --quiet HEAD -- || (echo "ERROR: Git working directory is not clean." && exit 1)

author: Hugo Montenegro, Konrad Urban
